Package cams.controller.person

Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
cams.controller.person.StudentManager
public class StudentManager extends Object
This class handles the logic and processing related to students.

    • addPoint

      public static void addPoint(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Gives a student a point.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of student.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if student with ID is not found in the repository.

    • joinCampCheck

      public static boolean joinCampCheck(String campID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Check if a student can join a camp. Student will be the current user.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of camp to join.
      Returns:
      true if student can join a camp.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with id cannot be found in the repository.

    • joinAsAttendee

      public static void joinAsAttendee(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Join a camp as attendee. Student will be current user.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to join.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID cannot be found.

    • joinAsCC

      public static void joinAsCC(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Join a camp as committee member. Student will be current user.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to join
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID cannot be found.

    • getJoinedCamps

      public static List<String> getJoinedCamps(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Get list of IDs of the camps the student has joined.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of the student.
      Returns:
      list of IDs of the camps the student has joined.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if student with ID cannot be found.

    • leaveCamp

      public static Boolean leaveCamp(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Withdraw from a camp. Camp committees will not be allowed to leave a camp they are a committee member of. Student will be current user.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of camp to leave
      Returns:
      true if withdrew successfully, false if otherwise.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if camp with ID cannot be found.
